dmca.title: Froogle DMCA complaint - Net Enforcer3 - Samsung
dmca.body:
Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named [ Samsung ] ("IP Owner"). I have
a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not
authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore
infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United
States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the
material or items claimed to be infringing.

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [ Samsung ]/:

Abe's of Maine 7/27/2006 SC-D363

violations:

http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.abesofmaine.com/images/small/ssscd363.jpg&size=2&dhm=af00bd89&hl=en

Hot Buys Electronics 7/27/2006 SC-D363

violations:

http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.hotbuyselectronics.com/images/samsung_scd363.jpg&size=2&dhm=f3fe31b5&hl=en

RefurbDepot.com 7/27/2006 SC-D363

violations:

http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.refurbdepot.com/products/standard/4428.jpg&size=2&dhm=86b6e6c5&hl=en

violations:

http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.secondact.biz/images/catalog/products/SamsungSCD363Lg.jpg&size=2&dhm=cce444fe&hl=en

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I
either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner
of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Printed Name: [ James Robbins ]

Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]

Street Address: [P.O. Box 9006]

City and State: [Coral Springs, FL]

Zip: [33075 ]

Email [ google@netenforcers.com]

Truthfully,

/S/: James Robbins
